name: pretium-lambda
description: AWS Lambda functions for Pretium LLM processing

scripts.build: npm run build:process-jobs && npm run build:trigger-processor
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name pretium-process-jobs --zip-file fileb://dist/process-jobs.zip && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name pretium-trigger-processor --zip-file fileb://dist/trigger-processor.zip
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf src/*/node_modules && rm -rf src/*/dist
